item.title: MartinMark for July 7th
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: The Apache Tomcat 5.5 Servlet/JSP Container - Load Balancer HOW-TO [原创] Apache + Tomcat + Load Balancing - ChinaUnix.net Clustering and Load Balancing in Tomcat 5, Part 1 - O’Reilly Media How to test web load balance Fronting Tomcat with Apache or IIS - Best practices The Apache Tomcat Connector - Webserver HowTo IIS HowTo I will try to implement this load balancer (Tomcat and Apache/IIS)Software LB
